Participants 10 60 ml ( approximately 1 4 tablespoon ) blood draw one follow test : - T cell subset enumeration - Serologic reactivity HIV antigens - Viral load assay bDNA , PCR , RT-PCR - Routine Laboratory assessment ( chemistry , liver function test , hepatitis serology , RPR ) - HIV-1 Resistance Testing These data use diagnostic , prognostic management decision outline current HIV-1 Treatment Guidelines
